text: Reșița (German: Reschitz, Hungarian: Resicabánya, Krashovani: Решица or Rešica, Czech: Rešice) is a city in the western part of Romania. It is the capital of Caraş-Severin County, in the Banat region. About 84,000 people live in Reşiţa as of the year 2004. Category:County capitals of Romania Category:Municipalities of Romania Category:Cities in Romania Category:Caraș- Severin County
title: Reşiţa
